content: lion brand pattern # 70404ad skill level beginner level 1 chenille thick & quick® article #950 *super bulky weight yarn can be substituted* a 500 yards b 400 yards c 400 yards crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm gauge block = 7 x 9 in 18 x 23 cm work 49 blocks 17 with a 16 with b and 16 with c in half_double_crochet u s sew blocks into 7 strips as described in written pattern sew strips together to finish no longer available on joann com p358197 lion brand warm up america blanket see warm up america afghan #chs-warmupamericaafghan 2 for a similar crochet pattern in homespun bulky weight yarn search for more warm up america 3 patterns on ravelry 1 http //www joann com/lion-brand-warm-up-america-blanket/p358197 html 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/warm-up-america-afghan-chs-warmupamericaafghan 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/search#pattern=warm%20up%20america&view=captioned_thumbs&sort=name
